mapper.select: select block_application_block.id, block_application_block.block_name, block_application_block.description, block_application_block.create_time, block_application_block.status, block_big_type.big_type_name, block_small_type.small_type_name, sys_user.username from block_application_block, block_big_type, block_small_type, sys_user where block_application_block.big_type_id = block_big_type.id and block_application_block.small_type_id = block_small_type.id and block_application_block.user_id = sys_user.id
